title: Oatmeal Cereal Recipe for Babies - Oatmeal Cerelac Recipe
content:
This time I will cover most of the nutritious health mix recipes for you. This oatmeal cereal is one of her favorites, it is very recently I started giving her this and she is in love with it.

 

First, let me cover one of the main topics which are about formula milk. I have been asked by many new moms about formula milk and which is good for babies. I would always prefer to give organic formula milk. I like to share a few words about this 

 

Oatmeal Cereal for Babies - Oats for Babies

 

Prep time

10 mins

 

Cook time

5 mins

 

Total time

15 mins

 

Recipe type: Breakfast

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 1 cup

 

Ingredients

Oats - 1 cup (You can use rolled oats or old fashioned oats)

Water as needed

Organic Formula Milk or Breast Milk as needed

 

Instructions

Take oats in a blender and powder it finely. Store it in an airtight container in the fridge till needed.

Now take a spoonful of oats powder in a saucepan, add some water and cook till it is creamy.

Now you can feed this as it is or you can add some breast milk or formula milk once the oats are warm or cold.
